items.title: Using Guarded Experts to Perform Protein Secondary Structure Prediction
items.description: Giuliano Armano, Francesco Mascia; International Transactions on Systems Science and Applications; Vol.5, No.4, pp. 390–396
details: See email from Tianfield, Huaglory; H.Tianfield@gcal.ac.uk, Reprint To ITSSA Journal, 07/10/2009 0.28, [->IJ2]

items.title: Experimenting Combinations of Content-Based and Collaborative Filtering with a Photo Recommender System
items.description: Maurizio Agelli, Giuliano Armano, Giancarlo Cherchi, Maria Laura Clemente, Daniela Ghironi; Communications of SIWN; Vol.5
details: Formalization of User Profiling techniques
Complete refactoring and optimization of libraries for text categorization
Installation of multiwordnet, parsing, and construction of Wordnet and Wikipedia datasets for the MySQL database

Adaptation and dump of the database (On Phobos "Wikipedia_Clasification Wordnet_Classification 20071207 1748.sql", "Pobas WordnetDomain 20071207 1731.sql") and the architecture for standalone use of the user profiling application; Tests on the installation process
Creation of classes for graphs and development of the simplified page ranking algorithm
Testing of libraries for queries via web service with xml-rpc protocol
Design of algorithms to determine the accuracy of the system towards a user, in particular the algorithm to assign a score to a user's interest in a given item based on their profile
Procedure for classifying a set of documents for the description of a user, for the reuse of available tools
Communication with CRS4 for the design and development of the architecture for user profiling and for the future development of the recommender system
Skype Chat E 07/04/2009 19:20
Development of Wiki.MAS @Hoplo (2008)

items.title: A MultiAgent System for Retrieving Bioinformatics Publications from Web Sources
items.description: Giuliano Armano, Andrea Manconi, Eloisa Vargiu; IEEE Transactions on Nanobioscience, Special Session on GRID, Web Services, Software Agents and Ontology Applications for Life Science; Vol.6 N.2, pp. 104–109
details: Startup of the BioPACMAS project, study of technologies for interfacing Jade with web services, in particular WSIG, WSDL
Creation of parsers for the BMC and Springer sites and construction of datasets for experimentation (16/04/2006)
Initial experimentation phases
Engineering of the PACMAS multi-agent system for starting Text Categorization experiments on selected datasets
Creation of the first prototype of the web server (thesis N. Degortes)
Setting up and starting experiments, collecting results in tabular and graphical format, and studying the performance of pipeline classification
Development of the web server and the first version of the interface for manual reclassification of available datasets by competent users. See also Poster BITS 2006.

items.title: Using Taxonomic Domain Knowledge in Text Categorization Tasks
items.description: Giuliano Armano, Francesco Mascia, Eloisa Vargiu; International Journal of Intelligent Control and Systems, Special Issue on “Distributed Intelligent Systems”; Vol.12 N.2, pp. 150–157, H. Zhu (ed.)
details: Development and setup of the multi-agent system for starting Text Categorization experiments
Creation of algorithms and infrastructure for pipeline classification of documents according to the "fixed threshold" and "threshold per classifier" methods
Creation of parsers for the Reuters dataset, structuring and optimization of the document database, setting up information agents for interfacing with the database, and preliminary test phases
Project on automatic taxonomy construction @Hoplo (2010)

items.title: A MultiAgent System for Monitoring Boats in Marine Reserves
items.description: Giuliano Armano, Eloisa Vargiu; Programming Multi-Agent Systems; L. Braubach, J.P. Briot, and J. Thangarajah (eds.), LNAI series, Springer-Verlag
details: The Agent system, architectural design
Initial "collaboration" with Brancaleone
The prototype system "Start.MAS" was used until the presentation of the project

items.title: PACMAS: A Personalized, Adaptive, and Cooperative MultiAgent System Architecture
items.description: Giuliano Armano, Giancarlo Cherchi, Andrea Manconi, Eloisa Vargiu; In Proceedings of WOA 2005 (Dagli Oggetti agli Agenti, Simulazione e Analisi Formale di Sistemi Complessi); Camerino (MC), Italy
details: Creation, development, prototyping, and reengineering of the PACMAS Multi-agent architecture
The work was used within the doctoral theses of Giancarlo Cherchi, Andrea Manconi, Massimiliano Saba.

items.title: Text Categorization Using a Personalized, Adaptive, and Cooperative MultiAgent System
items.description: Giancarlo Cherchi, Andrea Manconi, Eloisa Vargiu, Dario Deledda; In Proceedings of WOA 2005 (Dagli Oggetti agli Agenti, Simulazione e Analisi Formale di Sistemi Complessi); Camerino (MC)
details: See Degree Thesis
Adaptation of the PACMAS architecture for tasks related to Information Retrieval and Text Categorization
